name: Farmer's Nightmare
description:
What is Farmer's Nightmare?

You will embody a farmer who fights against farm animals, like chickens, cows or pigs for example. To defend yourself nothing like a good assault rifle, bullets and a life bar (This is a game, you need some challenge) and that's it, yeah, that's it (This is my first game, I'm waiting for feedback to correct my mistakes). Animals will arrive in waves and you'll have to kill them all while avoiding getting hit with hen wings or headbutts by my cows (Don't touch Marguerite).

Features:
  •   A demo map
  •   20 waves of animals to kill
  •   4 different types of animals
  •   4 upgrades available
  •   Every two waves you can choose between two upgrades in the "house"
Controls: WASD to move (ALT + SHIFT for French people) Left click to shoot R to reload E to take the upgrade you want Future development:
  •   A map in the atmosphere of the game, an abandoned farm with a      scarecrow  that would have some specificities like giving us malus or      bonus  (it could give a certain meaning and therefore a little story)
  •   Sounds
  •   6 more upgrades
  •   Procedural wave system
  •   One boss every 10 waves
  •   Some animals when they die could drop an item
  •   Improve the AI
  •   Permanent upgrades that can be bought via the menu or in the map with      through  money obtained while playing
Follow development -> https://trello.com/b/kSfJahhB/farmers-nightmare
